title: [Large-Scale] Online Language Education Design and Operational Strategies for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of language education theories and online teaching experience
context.additional_context: Need for customized learning design to increase workplace applicability for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core elements of each phase in the ADDIE model required for online instructional design
Learners can design one or more personalized language learning contents reflecting learner analysis results
Learners can operate classes by applying three interaction facilitation techniques in real-time online sessions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
